name: CoCreate Bundle File
summary: Learn about .BDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CoCreate programs were superseded by PTC Creo in June 2011 when PTC Creo was released. PTC Creo still supports the BDL format.

description: A BDL file is a data file created by CoCreate CAD software programs such as CoCreate Modeling, SolidDesigner, and OneSpace Designer. It stores a bundle of all data for a 2D or 3D design and is used to save and load model data.
